All I Do Is Bits, Bits, Bits.description: All I do is Bits, Bits, Bits! No matter what!

Ben Gon Give It To Ya.description: Angry Ben. Ben gon give it to ya. Ben is going to give it to you.

Bible Study.description: Bible Study. The way god wants it.

Chris Brynner.description: I'm Chris Brynner. Brynner Information Systems? You know, interface, operations, net access, channel 90? Oh, THAT Chris Brynner!

Coco Nono.description: I almost forgot... Another coco no no? Coconono. Nono.

Pretty Pervy.description: Chris Hansen: What's going on here seems pretty pervy (perv-y), doesn't it?

Priority One Messages.description: Priority One Message from Starfleet coming in on secure channel. Need supplemental income. Yeah it's extra. Why the interest alone could be enough to buy this ship!

There's Coffee In That....description: Captain Janeway: There's coffee in that...

The Boy!.description: Wesley? The boy? Young Wesley Crusher. My son! Baker Street.

The DMA Drop.description: D M A. DMA. (DMX) What does it want!?

You Really Want To Do This?.description: Deep Space Nine (DS9) Interstitial. You really want to do this here? Now? Okay!
